K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:380a-0: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems can @380a *//

K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:380a-7: gti mug dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams dang lhan cig gnas kyang kha na ma tho ba med la /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:380a-10: nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams dang lhan cig gnas kyang kha na ma tho ba med la /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:381b-0: yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bskor ba byas nas tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin dang lhan cig tu @381b shing rta la zhon te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:382b-0: @382b de 'jigs pa chen po skyes pa'i rgyu ni gnyis te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:388b-6: gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs; kha dog du ma 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:388b-13: dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:388b-14: de dag byung nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:388b-15: 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med bdag snang bas khyab par byas nas slar log ste bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:388b-16: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa mthong nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:388b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:388b-18: rgyu dang rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:388b-20: 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni gang lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:389a-0: de nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang gsol @389a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:389a-1: to; ;rnam 'dren 'jig rten mkhyen la ya mtshan mi mnga' bas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:389a-2: ston pa rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:389a-3: 'di ltar khyod ni 'dzum pa mdzad par gyur pa yi; ;khyod kyi 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni bdag cag shin tu 'tshal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:389a-4: rgyal ba'i zhal 'dzum mdzad par gyur pa mthong nas ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:389a-5: lhar bcas 'gro ba 'di dag the tshom skyes par gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:389a-6: the tshom gyur pa rnams kyi som nyi bsal du gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:389a-7: mi dbang 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni bstan du gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:389a-8: gang gis de ring chos rnams la ni yid bzhag gam //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:389a-9: chos nyid du ni rgyal ba la las mthong gyur tam //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:389a-10: sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i mchod pa gang gis deng bgyis sam //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:389a-11: bdag cag de dag nyan par 'tshal lo mi yi gtso //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:389a-12: gang gang de ring bdud rnams bzhon dang bcas bcom mam; ;gang gis ston pa'i thugs ni de ring dgyes bgyis sam //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:389a-13: gang gis de ring 'dus byas rnams kyi gting rtogs sam //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:389a-14: de dag nyan par 'tshal gyi the tshom bsal du gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:389a-15: 'dren pa 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni mnyan slad du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:389a-16: 'gro ba thams cad thal mo sbyar ba bgyis te sdod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:389a-17: rkang gnyis rnams kyi gtso bo thugs rje bskyed mdzod la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:389a-18: the tshom gyur pa rnams kyi yid gnyis bsal du gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:389a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:389a-21: khyod kyis smad tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal zhes bya ba 'di mthong ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:389b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:389b-7: smad tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal 'di ni sngon 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:389b-8: 'dis de las thos nas chos rnams la rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:389b-10: khyod kyis tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin zhes bya ba 'di mthong ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:389b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:389b-18: 'di ni ngas sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:389b-19: 'dis kyang nga las chos thos nas chos rnams la rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:389b-21: smad tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal 'di ni bskal pa 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis 'das pa'i 'og tu bskal pa rin chen 'byung ba zhes bya ba la 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen can zhes bya bar mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:389b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od ces bya bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:389b-24: 'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:390a-1: spyod pa ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:390a-2: de na byang chub sems dpa' rin po che dag ma gtogs par rin po che gzhan 'byung par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:390a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i tshe'i tshad ni dpag tu med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:390a-4: de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:390a-5: tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rin chen 'od ces bya ba 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:390a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i chos kyi mdzod 'dzin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:390a-7: gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rin chen 'od de la byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rin chen 'od 'di ni de'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:390a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:390a-9: de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa'ang nga'i ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar 'gyur ro zhes lung ston par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:390a-10: smad tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:390b-0: tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin gnyis lung bstan ma thag tu de'i mod la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g-yos shing 'jig rten du @390b snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:390b-1: lung bstan pa bshad pa 'di bstan pa na srog chags brgya stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:390b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:390b-4: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:390b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:390b-8: de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bkod pa chen po'i sgo'i le'u zhes bya bar zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:390b-9: 'jam dpal rnam par rol pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:390b-10: smad tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal btul ba zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:390b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:390b-12: smad tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:390b-13: tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:390b-14: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:390b-15: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:390b-16: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:390b-20: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:390b-21: 'phags pa 'jam dpal rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:390b-22: rgya gar gyi mkhan po su rendra bo dhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-002:391a-0: zhu chen gyi lo tstsha ba bandhe ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la @391a *//
